column2: JOB PROFILE FOR DOCTORS IN VLCC  Cosmetology  Center Doctors both full time & part time will report to the Slimming Head at center level. For all medical queries & guidance they will seek help from the regional heads -  The in house doctor/visiting-consultant must ensure that the zero session for all new clients is completed in time. The center doctor will take detailed medical history, which comprises of chief complaints in chronological order . The same should be documented with detailed symptoms of the disease if any.  Important  Negative medical history should also be mentioned besides past medical history, family history & personal history. A detailed medical examination should be started with a general physical, vital signs & systemic medical examination which must also include spine & locomotor system to judge the incapacitation of the client & how much activity patterns can be advised. All clients should bring their old investigation reports, if any & reports of investigation advised through VLCC will be shared jointly by the in house Doctor and the family physician for further course of action with respect to medication and slimming package. The Doctor must brief the Slimming Head on the same. All treatments will be started by the family / treating physician / gynae of the client. However monitoring will be done by our in house doctor.  1. Every new client booked for slimming is to be medically examined. i) To rule out any disease, disabilities he/ she may be suffering. ii) The drugs or the medicine he/she is taking. iii) Any ailment or any surgical or medical procedure he/she had in the recent past. 2. The history of the obesity related diseases to be elicited and any contra-indication to the VLCC program, to be intimated to the Slimming Head. 3. Review of all slimming clients every month and help the counsellor/ slimming Head in stuck up cases. 4. Reinforce the nutrition suggested to the slimming clients by Dietician. & will take active part in Group counseling. 5. To actively participate in the events organised to promote VLCC. 6. To maintain liaison with practicing doctors in the area. 7. To have interaction with R&D Slimming Head and send all the medical reports of concerned clients at the Corporate. 8. The in house doctors are expected not to take charge of the clients for their medical problem. It is expected that the clients are encouraged to consult their regular general physician / consultant for their day to day medical problems. However, an emergency can be handled but the regular medical attendant is to be informed. 9. All cards must be signed duly after medical examination and follow up. It is mandatory. 10. Any clients referred by the in-house Doctor must be informed to R&D Slimming Head who in turn must brief the Head R&D

column2: What you'll do  :  To develop as complete skin and hair Counselor and provide consultations to clients for their skin and hair-related problems.  Suggesting and performing treatments on patients based upon the diagnosis of skin and hair-related concerns.  Must have knowledge of Hair Loss Control and Hair Growth Treatments, Hair Growth Laser treatment, Mesotherapy, treatment with Derma roller, and PRP treatments.  Must have knowledge of Skin Treatments like peels, pigmentation treatment, removal of moles, warts & tags; Facial PRP; Q-switched laser treatment, and CIT Treatments.  Must have knowledge of Laser Hair reduction treatments and consultation thereof.  Consultation of Surgical hair transplant procedure.  Consultation for Hair Replacement procedure.  Follow-ups with the Patients about the treatments and their results.  Managing overall consultation and treatment process and converting the clients for the business. What makes you a great fit  :  Fluent in English,  Positive Attitude,  Self-driven,  Self-Motivated,  A Background of Skin, Hair, and Laser will be preferred,  Must be having on In-house Sales & Business Development.,  Will be preparing and analyzing the sales reports of the center.,  Fair to do Sales and excellence in Service is a must.  Female candidates are preferred. EXPERIENCE  3 + Experience in any hair and skin clinic.  Experience in taking consultations of all the aesthetic treatments related to hair and skin. REMUNERATION   Between 3.60 LPA to 4.80 LPA (depending upon relevant experience and capabilities)  PLUS  Assured incentive.   Provident Fund (optional)  Gratuity  payable as per law  TDS  deductible as per law  Festivals and national holidays - 4 JOB TYPE Full-Time/Permanent  OFFICE TIMINGS  6 days working in a week and there will be no weekly off on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday.  Office hours: 10:00 to 19:30 (9hrs mandate) (Flexible Timings) In case of any query, please call Ms. Mamta ( 9599219220) or email at jobs@berkowits.in

column2: Kailashi Hospital  is looking for DERMATOLOGY Professional  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey    A dermatologist is a medical doctor who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of conditions related to the skin, hair, and nails        Their job description typically includes the following responsibilities:        Diagnosis: Dermatologists are responsible for diagnosing various skin conditions, including acne, eczema, psoriasis, skin cancer, and others      They use their medical expertise, along with tools such as biopsies, to accurately diagnose these conditions      Treatment: Once a diagnosis is made, dermatologists develop treatment plans tailored to each patient's specific condition      Treatments may include prescribing medications, topical treatments, laser therapy, surgical procedures, or other interventions      Skin Cancer Screening: Dermatologists are often involved in screening patients for skin cancer, including performing full-body skin examinations and assessing suspicious moles or lesions      Cosmetic Procedures: Many dermatologists also offer cosmetic procedures to address issues such as wrinkles, scars, unwanted hair, and skin discoloration      These procedures may include Botox injections, chemical peels, laser therapy, and dermal fillers      Patient Education: Dermatologists educate patients about their skin conditions, treatment options, and preventive measures they can take to maintain healthy skin      This may include discussing proper skincare routines, sun protection, and lifestyle factors that can affect skin health      Research and Collaboration: Some dermatologists are involved in research to advance the understanding and treatment of skin conditions      They may also collaborate with other healthcare professionals, such as oncologists or plastic surgeons, to provide comprehensive care for patients with complex medical needs      Continuing Education: Dermatologists are required to stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in dermatology through continuing education and professional development activities      This ensures they can provide the highest standard of care to their patients      Record-Keeping: Like other medical professionals, dermatologists maintain detailed records of patient consultations, diagnoses, treatments, and follow-up care      Accurate record-keeping is essential for providing quality healthcare and coordinating care with other healthcare providers when necessary      Patient Communication: Dermatologists communicate regularly with patients to provide updates on their condition, discuss treatment options, and address any concerns or questions they may have      Strong communication skills are essential for building trust and ensuring patients are actively involved in their care

column2: As a skin laser technician, your primary responsibilities would revolve around operating laser equipment for various dermatological procedures and treatments aimed at improving skin health and appearance         Here's what your job might entail:           Consultation:    Meeting with clients to assess their skin concerns and discuss treatment options. This involves understanding their medical history, skin type, and desired outcomes.       Treatment Planning:    Developing customized treatment plans tailored to each clients needs and goals. This could include laser hair removal, skin resurfacing, tattoo removal, scar reduction, pigmentation correction, or other aesthetic procedures.       Laser Operation:    Safely operating laser devices to deliver precise wavelengths of light to targeted areas of the skin. This requires a deep understanding of laser physics and skin biology to ensure effective and safe treatments.       Patient Care:    Providing pre-treatment and post-treatment care instructions to clients, including skincare recommendations and possible side effects to expect. Ensuring that patients are comfortable and well-informed throughout the treatment process.       Safety and Compliance:    Adhering to strict safety protocols and regulations to minimize the risk of adverse reactions or complications. This includes proper use of protective eyewear, ensuring the correct settings on laser devices, and maintaining a clean and sterile treatment environment.       Documentation:    Keeping detailed records of each clients treatment history, including the types of procedures performed, treatment parameters used, and any adverse reactions or complications encountered.       Continuing Education:    Staying up-to-date on the latest advancements in laser technology, treatment techniques, and safety guidelines through ongoing education and training programs.       Client Education:    Educating clients about the benefits and limitations of laser treatments, as well as realistic expectations for results and the importance of proper skincare maintenance.       Overall, as a skin laser technician, your goal is to help clients achieve their desired aesthetic outcomes while prioritizing their safety and well-being throughout the treatment process. Effective communication, technical proficiency, and a strong commitment to professional ethics are essential qualities for success in this role

column2: Doctor to facilitate disease prevention, health promotion, and clinical management of various health problems and disorders         Key Responsibilities         Providing medical consultation to new and follow-up cases, which includes taking medical history, performing clinical examination (to the extent practically possible and feasible in case of virtual consultation in alignment with the Telemedicine Guideline); making clinical assessment (provisional/final diagnosis, triage, and categorization as per disease severity and risk stratification); prescribing necessary laboratory investigations and diagnostic procedures); advising treatment (including medication and preventive health advice); and making necessary referrals (to other providers/specialists and for hospitalization).     Providing specialized consultation and services to patients with various dermatological conditions, including but not limited to common skin infections, sexually transmitted infections, acne, dermatological manifestations of various chronic noncommunicable and autoimmune diseases, and similar other health concerns.     Ordering screening tests and other measures that aid in the diagnostics and prognostication, and reporting / reviewing reports pertaining to your specialty domain and provide treatment based on the reports.     Performing, facilitating, and/or supervising relevant tests/ procedures including skin scrapings for pathological examination and tissue culture and chalking out treatment plans based on the test reports.     Prescribing or administering (or facilitating administration of) medication, other therapeutic support, and specialized medical care as part of prevention, treatment, and disease control.     Counseling of patients and their attendants, with appropriate explanation and discussion on test results, disease severity, treatment options, prescribed treatment, prognosis, etc     Making clinical notes of medical consultations provided by you and documenting the same in a structured manner to create medical records and prescriptions. This will require you to make necessary entries in the HCL Healthcare s electronic medical records as the organization mostly uses specific electronic software and systems (and you will be given necessary training thereon) for this purpose.      You will provide prescription / e-prescription to your patients without any undue delay.     Issuing medical certificate (medical illness certificate, medical fitness certificate, etc) based on your clinical judgment on case-to-case basis and in compliance to standard medical protocol for this purpose.     Responding to clinical and allied requests/queries as received through verbatims, emails, and other approved electronic modes (such as MS Teams) appropriately and within specified turnaround time as per the standard operating procedure for it.     Coordinating with internal team members and relevant external stakeholders (including statutory health authorities) as part of rendering medical services and providing necessary information through approved modes and manners.     Ensuring clinical quality in the medical services rendered by you, which includes but is not limited to abiding with and adherence to standard treatment protocols, clinical pathways, and management guidelines as issued/ endorsed by the statutory health authorities, renowned health agencies, reputed medical/scientific bodies, and the organization's medical governance committee, and updates thereon from time to time.     Supporting operational quality and compliances in relevant clinic operations, which includes but is not limited to abiding with and adherence to standard operating procedures, infection prevention & control protocols, good prescription practices, reporting of notifiable diseases and other key incidents, and performing similar other activities as and when required / asked to do so by the organization.   Rendering your services with demonstration of good soft skills and interpersonal communication skills (verbal, non-verbal, written, and electronic) including cordial interaction with other team members, display of empathy & compassion with patients, and performing duties with sincerity, punctuality, integrity, and team spirit.      You will perform your duties as per the agreed working hours and will not resort to unauthorized absence or take leave without prior intimation.     Attending to cases when requested by other doctors/providers at HCL Healthcare (which can sometimes happen even outside your routine duty hours in case of emergency/exigency).     Participating in clinical and allied trainings, meetings, and similar other activities as and when required/ asked to do so by the organization.     This will also include facilitate training of other team members/subordinate staff and/or conducting health advocacy sessions/webinars as and when required/ asked to do so by the organization.     Handling clinical and allied queries, complaints & similar other incidents for their appropriate and amicable redressal/ closure and submitting status update / action taken report thereon.     Any other medical and/or administrative task or responsibility that may be assigned to you by the organization, your reporting manager, or medical supervisor, in view of achieving the organization s objectives and in the wake of any medical or administrative exigency that may arise from time to time.         Qualification:    MD DVD from recognized Indian Medical Colleges       Experience 2 Plus Years Post MD/DVD     At least one year of outpatient patient care experience         Competencies         Clinical and Analytic Skills, Interpersonal & Communication skills, Team Player, Open to Learning and Professional Development
column11: telemedicine, Diagnostics, Test reporting, Standard operating procedures, Patient care, Medical services, Tissue culture, Healthcare, medical records, Operations
